page.title: 20A Day in the Life of Lisa.
page.content: "Lisa time to get up". I am half awake at 7.30 am. My sister gets up and has breakfast, I get up and have a wash. It's a Monday morning and all I can think about is bed. I get dressed and go downstairs. At 8.20 my friend comes. We walk to school and talk a lot! When we get school we have a natter about the weekend. At 9.00 a.m. we all pile into school ready to work. We sometimes start with maths then topic work or perhaps P.E. We assemble at 10.10 and then it is playtime for 15 minutes. At 12.00 we have lunch and play until 1.20 and do more work. At 3.00 we have a story. At 3.20 we go home. We have dinner at 5.00. Then I get ready for Majorettes. I get in my dad's van and off we go. It lasts from 6.00 till 9.00 and by then sweat is dripping off my head. At 9.30 I go to bed.
